column2:
"Hey, it's you. It seems that lately there are
imitation ARKS members,
and they're confusing everyone."

"Are you okay in that regard?
You understand that there's
no need to hesitate."

"Regardless of what they look like,
if they are doing harm you have to defeat them.
Like passing judgment on a criminal."

"If you say that you can't defeat them
because they look human, the D-arkers will
all start imitating our forms to conquer us."

"Look back, think, and regret
after you defeat them, no matter the cost."

"We are not skillful enough
to fight while worrying,
nor worry while fighting."

"Yes, I constantly worried over a hundred different things
when I was younger..."

"やあ、君か。
最近アークスの模倣体が出現し
皆を惑わせているようだな。"

"君は、大丈夫か？
戸惑う必要はないということを
わかっているな？"

"何に似ていようとも、それが世界に
害なすのであれば倒すしかないだろう。
犯罪者が裁かれるように、だ。"

"人の形をしているから倒せないと言えば
ダーカーはこぞって人の形を模倣し
制圧してくるぞ。"

"振り返り、後悔し、考えることは
万難を排した後でいいのだ。"

"戦いながら悩めるほど
いや、悩みながら戦えるほど
我々は器用ではない。"

"そう、私の若い頃は悩みなど
常に百ほど抱えた状態で…………"
